ClassDesc: A @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#StaleObjectException_E@ exception is thrown when a @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiObject2_E@ is used after the underlying https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#View_E@ has been destroyed. In this case, it is necessary to call @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiDevice#findObject_E@ to obtain a new @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiObject2_E@ instance.
